According to relevant laws and regulations in China, when the number of confirmed cases has a steady decline and the risk of the spread of the epidemic is effectively controlled, each province should reduce the emergency response levels accordingly. In fact, local governments adjust emergency response levels according to the local epidemic situation. Provincial governments use counties as a unit to divide different regions into high-risk, medium-risk, and low-risk areas and implement different prevention and control measures in the different risk areas.
